alert.note: Alert for Warren; Washington (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 12 at 10:25PM EDT until August 12 at 11:30PM EDT by NWS Albany
info.description: The National Weather Service in Albany has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Warren County in east central New York... Northwestern Washington County in east central New York... * Until 1130 PM EDT. * At 1024 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Eagle Point Campground to 7 miles northwest of Day Center, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Warrensburg, Lake George Village, Johnsburg, Hague, Eagle Point Campground, Scaroon Manor Public Campground, Bolton Landing, Rogers Rock Campground, Chestertown, North Creek, Huletts Landing, Putnam, Mount Hope, Bolton, Wright, Thurman, Lake George, Stony Creek, Harrisburg and Thurman Station. Please report hail size...damaging winds and reports of trees down to the National Weather Service by email at Alb.Stormreport@noaa.gov... On Facebook at www.facebook.com/nwsalbany or twitter @nwsalbany HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with these storms, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
